REALDARK.Settings.Menu.Name: Theme Configuration
REALDARK.Settings.Menu.Label: Open Wizard
REALDARK.Settings.Menu.Hint: Open the RealDark visual configuration tool to customize your theme.
REALDARK.Wizard.Title: RealDark Configuration
REALDARK.Wizard.Subtitle: Ultimate Customizer
REALDARK.Settings.WizardShown.Name: Wizard Shown
REALDARK.Settings.BackgroundImage.Name: Main Background Texture
REALDARK.Settings.ColorBackground.Name: Sheet Background Color
REALDARK.Settings.ColorBackground.Hint: Base color for the sheet background (replaces parchment).
REALDARK.Settings.BgSize.Name: Background Size
REALDARK.Settings.BgSize.Hint: How the background image scales (cover, contain, etc).
REALDARK.Settings.PlaqueImage.Name: Header Plaque Texture
REALDARK.Settings.ColorGold.Name: Primary Text Color
REALDARK.Settings.ColorGold.Hint: Main color for text and highlights. Default: Amber Gold.
REALDARK.Settings.ColorGoldDim.Name: Secondary Color (Dim)
REALDARK.Settings.ColorAccent.Name: Accent Color
REALDARK.Settings.ColorAccent.Hint: Color for modifiers, numbers, and untrained badges.
REALDARK.Settings.ColorLight.Name: Content Text Color
REALDARK.Settings.InputBg.Name: Input Field Background
REALDARK.Settings.InputBg.Hint: Background color for text inputs (supports transparency).
REALDARK.Settings.SidebarOpacity.Name: Sidebar Opacity
REALDARK.Settings.SidebarOpacity.Hint: Opacity of the sidebar background gradient (0.0 - 1.0).
REALDARK.Settings.ColorBanner.Name: Banner/Sidebar Color
REALDARK.Settings.ColorBanner.Hint: Background color for the sidebar header (replaces image).
REALDARK.Import.Title: Import RealDark Theme
REALDARK.Import.Instruction: Select a JSON file to import:
REALDARK.Settings.GlobalEnable.Name: Enable RealDark Theme
REALDARK.Settings.GlobalEnable.Hint: Uncheck this to completely disable the theme for debugging purposes.
REALDARK.Settings.ChatHeaderColor.Name: Chat Header Bar Color
REALDARK.Settings.ChatHeaderColor.Hint: Shows a colored bar at the top of chat cards matching the player's color.
